channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks

item.title: CVE-2021-24352|2024-08-03T19:28:23.446Z -- unknown -- simple%20301%20redirects%20by%20betterlinks
item.description: The export_data function of the Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 2.0.4 had no capability or nonce checks making it possible for unauthenticated users to export a site's redirects.

item.title: CVE-2021-24356|2024-08-03T19:28:23.784Z -- unknown -- simple%20301%20redirects%20by%20betterlinks
item.description: In the Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 2.0.4, a lack of capability checks and insufficient nonce check on the AJAX action, simple301redirects/admin/activate_plugin, made it possible for authenticated users to activate arbitrary plugins installed on vulnerable sites.

item.title: CVE-2021-24354|2024-08-03T19:28:23.447Z -- unknown -- simple%20301%20redirects%20by%20betterlinks
item.description: A lack of capability checks and insufficient nonce check on the AJAX action in the Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 2.0.4, made it possible for authenticated users to install arbitrary plugins on vulnerable sites.

item.title: CVE-2021-24355|2024-08-03T19:28:23.655Z -- unknown -- simple%20301%20redirects%20by%20betterlinks
item.description: In the Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 2.0.4, the lack of capability checks and insufficient nonce check on the AJAX actions, simple301redirects/admin/get_wildcard and simple301redirects/admin/wildcard, made it possible for authenticated users to retrieve and update the wildcard value for redirects.

item.title: CVE-2021-24353|2024-08-03T19:28:23.449Z -- unknown -- simple%20301%20redirects%20by%20betterlinks
item.description: The import_data function of the Simple 301 Redirects by BetterLinks WordPress plugin before 2.0.4 had no capability or nonce checks making it possible for unauthenticated users to import a set of site redirects.
